reviewText: A similar jacket is used to DVD concluding ALL FIFTY sequences of ZONA ("State Penetrial Territory"), of which an American of Russian-Jewish descent trip to Russia underlines a range of episodes consisting this Russian prison epic integrating significantly inmates existence with law enforcement officials criminal activities on a landscape of gloomy, brutal, double-standard ways of a life in- / outside jail walls transparent for local mafia. Unlike a classic US serial Oz - The Complete Seasons 1-6, no much explicit action has been screened but following a pure Russian tradition, a more philosophical context of characters' deeds is being deployed by producer Peter Stein passed away a few days ago. A clear Russian accent and specific slang make this work priceless for improving the foreigners' comprehending of Russian to an advanced level. And music is very nice.
